title: Best of The Herd: 11/18/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/18/2019
description:
Colin says the Cowboys remind him of the Golden State Warriors when they had Mark Jackson as their head coach and it's not a good sign for Jason Garrett. He is not all that concerned about the Patriots despite another poor offensive performance against the Eagles. He thinks Tua Tagovailoa breaking his hip might have really helped his NFL career and explains why. Plus, 4x Pro Bowl QB Michael Vick talks about Lamar Jackson's impressive performance against the Texans and what he likes about Dak Prescott.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
